pr_title: fix(plugins): Configured ObjectMapper and better respoonse body handling

timeline.message: fix(plugins): Configure http client object mapper
fix(plugins): Configured ObjectMapper and better respoonse body handling

timeline.bodyText: Would be kinda cool if we could configure some of this on a per-plugin level if we want to debug a plugin's HTTP calls with more granularity.
timeline.author: jonsie

replies.bodyText: We can! HttpClientConfig is provided by the plugin itself.
replies.author: robzienert

replies.bodyText: Oh nice, didn't notice this was a change to the kork-plugins-api module. 👍
replies.author: jonsie
